about_the_game:
God doesn't play dice games.
Because he likes slot machines.

4X4 PROGRESS is a new type of strategic design game.
You have to calculate the optimal layout to get a lot of resources and use them to advance your civilization,
but the layout you worked hard to make is randomly shuffled the next turn.
You can save only part of your layout by spending resources, but it's entirely up to the player how to save your layout efficiently.

In the 4X4 PROGRESS Demo, players become the god of one of the civilizations Russia, Japan, and an unprecedented new civilization and lead them from the Stone Age to the Modern Era.
(There are 16 playable civilizations in the main game!)
In a small 4X4 island, you place various tiles such as cities, farmlands, and mines, and depending on the layout, you have to get resources and induce technological development to advance your civilization.
Of course, each civilization has its own unique characteristic and tiles, so you can enjoy different gameplay for each civilization.

Defend your civilization from the attacks of enemies that invade at regular intervals,
and can your civilization launch a rocket into space?

Features

  • A new strategic design game where you have to calculate the optimal layout but control the randomness.
  • An alternate history simulation where you choose between Russia, Japan, or an unprecedented new civilization and enjoy a different play style for each civilization from the Stone Age to the Modern Era.
  • Various difficulty settings that induce a sense of challenge
  • 70+ historical tiles with 8-bit graphics.
